2015-04-08-back-to-my

Posted on April 8, 2015

Back to my Island

For such a long time i have been thinking about this freedom the Internet gives us, it was part of my beliefs, of my motivations. I like the Internet because it allows people far away to do big things, to express themselves.

So i finally did it, i came back, and it is not going to be easy.

I started from an ideal job, with great colleagues, and now i face the problems coming from my decision
